channel.title: CVE Feed for HP Inc. -- Multiple - See https://support.hp.com/rs-en/document/c06456250
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP Inc. -- Multiple - See https://support.hp.com/rs-en/document/c06456250

item.title: CVE-2019-16284|2024-08-05T01:10:41.768Z -- hp%20inc. -- multiple%20-%20see%20https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.hp.com%2Frs-en%2Fdocument%2Fc06456250
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in multiple HP products and versions which involves possible execution of arbitrary code during boot services that can result in elevation of privilege. The EFI_BOOT_SERVICES structure might be overwritten by an attacker to execute arbitrary SMM (System Management Mode) code. A list of affected products and versions are available in https://support.hp.com/rs-en/document/c06456250.
